body.name: SANODESK Electric Standing Desk 48 x 24 Inches, Height Adjustable Stand Up Desk w/2-Button Controller, Ergonomic Computer Desk for Home Office, White Frame + Natural Tabletop
features: Electric Lifting System: 2-Button Controller, there are no complicated buttons, easy to adjust the lifting with one touch as long as plugged in the power. The lifting height range covers 28.6 inches to 46.3 inches, which meets most of the needs of work and daily life.

48" x 24" Whole-Piece Desktop: Spacious worksurface provides plenty of space for collaboration and creativity, up for any challenge. Easy to put two monitors, laptop, printer, landline and all kinds of interesting knickknacks.

Stable T-shaped Legs: Made of thickened steel pipe, which prevents wobbling. The surface is coated with fine and smooth paint that is waterproof and rustproof, easy to clean and not easy to accumulate dust.
Colorblock Design: The white table legs match the wood-colored desktop. The overall look is simple and refreshing, as it is practical and suitable for different decoration styles in various setups.

Your satisfaction is our priority. If you encounter any problems when you receive the product or use it, we provide a 30-day return or exchange service. Please contact customer service through the order page. We are very much willing to offer assistance.
body.description: Get a Smooth, Steady and Quiet Ride Utilize a standing desk to insert healthy movement into your day! A height adjustable desk can help counteract the adverse health effects of a sedentary job while allowing you to be more focused at work. Alternating between standing and sitting can also reduce fatigue and create a more pleasant work experience. Desktop Size: 48" x 24" Minimum Height: 28.6" Maximum Height: 46.3" Input Voltage: 100-240V Max Weight Capacity: 132 lbs Package: 1 boxes 30-Day Return or Exchange Service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Title: A Versatile and Modern Standing Desk Solution - SANODESK Electric Height Adjustable Desk FrameReview:The SANODESK Electric Height Adjustable Standing Desk Frame is a remarkable addition to any office or workspace. This desk frame seamlessly blends functionality, modern design, and robust construction to create an outstanding standing desk solution.One of the standout features of this desk frame is its electric height adjustability. With a strong motor, you can effortlessly transition from sitting to standing positions, promoting a healthier work routine and reducing the strain of prolonged sitting. This feature alone is a game-changer in terms of ergonomics and personal comfort.The desk frame's dimensions (30"D x 60"W x 24.6"H) provide ample space for your work essentials while fitting comfortably in most office settings. The black finish and modern style add a touch of sophistication to any workspace, making it a stylish addition to your office decor.The construction of the desk frame is robust and durable. Made from alloy steel with a powder-coated finish, it not only looks sleek but is also built to withstand the rigors of daily use. This desk frame is a testament to quality craftsmanship and is designed to last.The versatility of this standing desk frame is commendable. It can be easily mounted to the floor, ensuring stability and safety during height adjustments. Whether you're setting up your home office or upgrading your workplace, this frame is a versatile solution that can adapt to different room layouts and office designs.In summary, the SANODESK Electric Height Adjustable Standing Desk Frame is a top-notch choice for individuals seeking a modern and functional addition to their workspace. The electric height adjustability, sleek design, durable construction, and easy installation make it an excellent investment. If you're looking for a standing desk frame that prioritizes your health and comfort while enhancing your office aesthetics, this is the one to choose. It undoubtedly deserves a perfect 5 out of 5 rating, as it ticks all the boxes for an exceptional standing desk solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this desk. Very clean and elegant looking . Easy to assemble and best part is that the top is one whole piece instead of a segmented top like most of these other desks . Motor works great and you can set it for any height .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love it!
reviews.reviewText: This desk is perfect and exactly what I was looking for. It’s great quality for the price. I assembled myself, and I’m a very petite woman. The instructions could be a little clearer but honestly, if I can put it together, you can too. It was pretty easy to follow, just unclear in some parts and which material is which. I love it and highly recommend it. It looks very nice in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great, sturdy desk. Relatively easy to put together. Take your time and you will be fine. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great so far for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking for a standing desk for awhile and was looking for a specific size but didn’t want to send a fortune. This fit the bill! Easy to follow instructions for building the desk. I did it by myself in less than an hour. Pretty sturdy but could be a little more sturdy. I’ve only had it about a week but working as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality / Easy assemble / easy to adjust height/ plenty of room
reviews.reviewText: It's a perfect fit for my needs: two large monitors, keyboard, and plenty of extra room. Easy to adjust the height and great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid and easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Pros: Solid build, Easy to assemble, accommodates a variety of table sizes, smooth lower/raise motion.Cons: Could have used an extra hardware attachment hole on the table support.I turned my old 36x39" dining table into my computer stand. I needed the width to accommodate my two 27" vertical mounted LG monitors and my desktop computer while having enough table space for my keyboard, Ipad and Phone table mount.I was worried the table support width was too short to fit the 39" side of the table; it worked out perfectly.My next concern was the combined weight of the table itself, two 27" monitors, monitor stands, desktop computer, drink decanter, and all the other items on my desk which added to approximately 110lbs. The motor handle the weight very well.This stand only has up or down and no memory feature, however, I really don't need it since i keep the table height the same 90% of the time.Overall, worth the $100 to personalize a standing desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sit Stand Desk/Table
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Love this desk. Assembled it myself in about 2 hours, very good diagrammed instructions. You will need a second person for parts of assembly. Was very well wrapped and packaged, no damage. Very sturdy and seems well made. Like the many finish and size options. Simple push button to raise and lower. Great purchase if it keeps working!
